title: SMC_MonotoneSentenceHistory (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_MonotoneSentenceHistory IMPLEMENTS
SMC_ISentenceHistory
This implementation of
SMC_ISentenceHistory
requires new elements
to fit into a monotonically increasing sequence of sentences.
If sentence numbers are not monotonically increasing, an error will be
returned.
Methods:
ContainsElement
RegisterElement
Reset
Structure:
ContainsElement (Method)
RegisterElement (Method)
Reset (Method)
